item.title: Motion Graphics Video Editor needed for VSL - Upwork
item.description:
THE MAIN TASK:
- I actually need an editor specializing in motion graphics to create social media ads just like/better than these two:
https://app.foreplay.co/share/ads/kr0C2CJhLZteLPL7SUmA?user=Dan%20Ragan
https://f.io/P9eesoMR

Serious candidates only, your line of editing has to look like/better than this vertical video for social media.
Must need experience in this niche, or a high confidence level for pulling this off.




------
THE OPPORTUNITY
- Our UGC ad agency (http://www.ugcfactory.io) is seeking a part-time video editor responsible for editing VSL's for me.

WHY WORK WITH ME?
- 10+ years experience building organizations from the ground up, managing teams of 15+ full-time employees, ensuring project milestones are hit, and consistently delivering for clients on-time and within budget.
- I'm dedicated to ongoing learning and make sure I share this knowledge with the people I work with. You'll have access to my proprietary database of productivity tools + tutorials + recommendations, something I've invested thousands of hours + dollars to create and regularly maintain.
- Developed automation systems that deliver results with limited resources... and form the backbone of my approach to organization building.

Hourly Range: $40.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 03:17 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Advertisement, Testimonial Video, Final Cut Pro, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Animation, Mixed Media, Video Editing & Production, Adobe Premiere Elements, DaVinci Resolve
Skills: Advertisement, Testimonial Video, Final Cut Pro, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Animation, Mixed Media, Video Editing & Production, Adobe Premiere Elements, DaVinci Resolve
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
